name: Rememberall
author: Rene L

sections.description: Themes, plugins and the WordPress core need to be updated. WordPress updates help keep your website secure and bug-free, ensuring you have the latest features, better compatibility, and a smooth WordPress experience. Rememberall helps you remember these updates. As soon as there are updates, the site admin will receive an email notification.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire rememberall folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Finished. The admin gets an email once a day, if an update is available.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • bug fix validate Header

1.0.1

  • bug fix HTML tag in subject

1.0.0

  • release

short_description: Daily email report if updates are available.
